body.name: Lukinbox 9x12 Washable Area Rugs for Living Room, Large Non-Slip Low Pile Rug for Bedroom, Soft Vintage Abstract Accent Rugs Non Shedding Carpet for Dinning Room Nursery Home Office(Light Coffee)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Marble-inspired Design: Switch up the look and feel of your living with this marble-inspired light coffee abstract rug. Its light coffee color tone is calm, rich, complementary, and are a good fit for different parts of the home

Skin-freindly and Low Profile: 100% Environmentally freindly faux wool material. Machine-made and dyed by advanced technology, has good fastness, is largely soft. 0.3inch pile makes the perfect low-profile composition for sitting under furniture

Non-slip and Non-shedding: The non-skid TPE backing with resilience against everyday wear-and-tear which keeps the rug in place. It does not spill or smell. It also features durable edges and machine-made from upgraded polyester making them non-shedding

Easy Care and Foldable: Simply vacuum regularly, machine wash with a laundry bag, tumble dry on low heat, or spot clean with a solution of mild detergent and water. The foldable rug is a versatile option for homes and lives, packed in its own easy to handle tote bag

More to Explore: Great for any high traffic area, less affected by unforeseeable messes, including kids and pets activity. Nursery, playroom, bedroom, living room, dining room, hallway, kitchen, bathroom, entryway are also be recommended
body.description: Lukinbox area rugs, which create a warm atmosphere in your home by providing comfort under your feet with their environmentally production, provide a beautiful appearance in your home.How to Flatten a Rug That’s Been FoldedPrevent the CreasesBefore you put your rug away in storage, always be sure to give it a proper cleaning.Tightly Roll the Rug When StoringTypically, you’ll want to roll the rug with the pile facing inward (the pile is the top side of the rug), as the pile is more fragile.Store in a Cool EnvironmentLast but not least, make sure you store your rug in a cool, dry environment, and preferably one that’s off the ground. Also, don’t place anything on top of the rug, as this can cause cracks and creases.How to Getting Out the CreasesRipples/WavesTypically, a rug will have ripples or waves in it if it is a new rug. All you need to do is lay the rug flat, and the waves will even themselves out after a day or two. CornersTo flatten corners, a lot of people think the best thing to do is to place a heavy object on them. While this can work, the best thing to do is to actually fold the corners under and let them rest for a day or two.IroningOnly resort to ironing if the creases are still present after waiting two full days. Start by ironing it on the lowest setting possible with the steam on. If your iron doesn’t have a steam setting, sprinkle on some water before you begin. To protect the rug from being burned by the iron, place a piece of plain brown craft paper between the iron and the rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great washable area rug
reviews.reviewText: Overall ImpressionsI was at first concerned that this blue rug from Lukinbox wouldn’t lay flat because of how tightly it was packaged, but after a few days it looks like it’s always been there! It is soft, and comfortable, and it’s become the de-facto activity and dance floor for my kids.SizeThe rug is true to size according to the product description, and it covers a very large area.WashabilityI think I understand why this rug is thin, it’s so it’s washable. It fit in a normal front-loader dishwasher, and dried easily in the drier. I was worried that the color would leech or something, but the pattern was perfect even after washing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the look of it in our living room fits perfect to size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and large
reviews.reviewText: A good large size quality rug that is washable is an amazing find! It is thin so while the price is good, you need to purchase an underlay rug for extra comfort. If it's for show, than this rug works well - good design and look and feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large and soft
reviews.reviewText: Not easy to find such a big rug that's washable. Very soft and dense so feels great.Love the color pattern which won't show any dirt or spots easily. We have two cats so they love to play, but we don't have to worry about this rug.Excellent price for quality product. We are happy about this so recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and soft.
reviews.reviewText: The rug is soft and thick but low profile at the same time. Took a little while to get the creases out from packaging but it ended up laying flat. I had to already wash it once do to child spilling a drink. To my surprise it was simple to wash and the stain came right out with the washer machine. Large rug great for many spaces in my opinion. Fantastic value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love these kinds of rugs! Lays almost flat straight from the box and doesn't take long until it does. Not a thick rug and very easy to clean. Vacuum goes right over it and spills clean up easily. We got the blue and really like it! Fabric is soft and great for our toddler to play on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice to find such a large (9x12) washable rug
reviews.reviewText: This is a typical machine washable rug - although I got the 9x12 size so I will have to take it to the special laundromat. Anyway it won't need laundering often because it repels liquids, they just bead up on the surface. And a good vacuum and a microfiber cloth keeps it clean. It is thin like a tapestry so you just have to lay it our and stretch out all the creases and it stays put. It has a very low pile. I put it on top of another rug of the same size to protect that rug from my dog's messes. It looks just like the photo. If you don;t use a rug or pad underneath it would not provide much cushioning, but would still look nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used this in my son's room and it looks fantastic. It is soft to the touch and protects the carpet well. I would definitely recommend it.
